olm.general.approxI¶

olm.general.approxI(metals_conc)[source]¶

Calculates approximate ionic strength from the total concentration of metals.

Uses equation 2.19 or 2.20 in Dreybrodt (1988). Approximation is good in most natural karst waters.

Parameters
metals_concfloat or array

concentration of metals (mol/L)

Returns
Ifloat or array

ionic strength
